testcase.name: sendPasswordReset_ValidatesEmailContent
testcase.system-out: 2025-08-01T16:24:24.237-03:00 INFO 194326 --- [blog-api] [ main] [ ] com.blog.api.service.EmailService : Password reset email sent to: test@example.com

testcase.name: sendPasswordReset_EmailDisabled_SkipsEmail
testcase.system-out: 2025-08-01T16:24:24.242-03:00 INFO 194326 --- [blog-api] [ main] [ ] com.blog.api.service.EmailService : Email sending is disabled. Skipping password reset for user: test@example.com

testcase.name: sendEmailVerification_Success
testcase.system-out: 2025-08-01T16:24:24.253-03:00 INFO 194326 --- [blog-api] [ main] [ ] com.blog.api.service.EmailService : Email verification sent to: test@example.com
